description: Brand New Corner Rowhome in the most desirable area of Langley! Experience comfortable living at 20489 74B Ave in Langley. This charming 6-bedroom, 4-bathroom home offers a bright, open layout with lots of natural light. The modern kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances, and the living room features a cozy fireplace, perfect for relaxing. Nestled in a peaceful neighbourhood, this home is close to Highway 1 access, Langley Event Centre, Golds Gym and many schools, parks, and local shopping for added convenience. The corner unit allows for 3 car parking with more parking access in the front! MOTIVATED SELLERS!! Option to finish 2 bedroom suite for all units with Kitchen and A/C upgrade possible as well.    OPEN HOUSE DEC 13 & 14, SAT & SUN 2:00PM-4:00PM
